data.name: 3D Fractal Landscape Generator
data.description: Generates a spinning 3D landscape using an algorithm that recursivley draws fractal triangles of varied dimensions

data.name: BattleBoats
data.description: A recreation of Battleship using embedded systems and state machines for two PIC32 microcontrollers.

data.name: NQueens
data.description: Solves the classic 8 queens problem but for boards to size 15. Also determines if a board with pre-placed queens is solvable.

data.name: AVL Tree
data.description: An implementation of a self-balancing AVL tree that handles range-queries.

data.name: Hollywood Graph Path Finder
data.description: A graph made with data scraped from IMBD that finds the shortest path between actors/actresses with a BFS.

data.name: Education Atlas
data.description: Website for connecting high school students with college student mentors for advice on college applications and beyond [program curently paused]

data.name: Climately
data.description: Web app demo built at CruzHacks. Made to educate people on climate change and encourage them to engage

data.name: Subvocalization Classifier
data.description: Machine learning model that can classify between 'yes' and 'no' from subvocalized EMG data. Reaches up to 95% accuracy.
